content.detailedDescription: So, last night i had went outside to check on my rabbits that are in a hutch up against my garage. i was getting their water bottles and i seen something fly by my head just over the top of our privacy fence. it sort of looked like a bat flying really fast so i didn't think anything of it. well, i seen it fly back in front of me going the opposite direction, in the way it came the first time. still, didn't think anything of.. i grabbed the bottles and was getting ready to come back into the house when i looked up on the side of the garage and there was a small, approx 2 inch in diamater circular light shinging on it.. actually, it was more l  like bouncing around on the side of the garage. i looked all around because i thought it was someone with a flashlight, which didn't make sense because it was green, and i saw no one. at one point i think i actually seen the light shine on my jacket and i got a little freaked out and walked to the other side of the yard. again, still thinking someone was shining a flash light. well, as soon as i walked to the other side of the yard i looked and the light was gone from the side of the garage. we have a privacy fence so it would be hard for even a neighbor to shine a light on me or the spot the light was on. i thought it was strange but came back inside, told my girlfriend and that was that. well, i went outside today to play with my dogs and i seen my baby rabbit sitting down in the cage. i walked over and i noticed he wasn't moving. it's because he was dead!!! he was sitting up against the door of the hutch like he was just laying down taking a rest, his eyes were open.. everything looked fine at first. except for the fact he was stiff and dead. as i looked closer, the right half of his ear was gone. it looked like it had been cut off. and, after we got him out, on his left hind leg there is a small spot where his fur is missing. the fur has been perfectly removed. there isn't one hair in this spot left, yet the skin hasn't been broken at all. you can see all of his muscles, his veins, etc. there was only one drop of blood which was on the door of the hutch and that's it. he is in with his mother and at first i thought maybe she killed him, but i find it odd that he's been in with her for two weeks now and last night he was just fine when i seen the light and now today hes dead with these mysterious things wrong with him. if i can post pictures, i will. it's just strange for this to be a coincidence. i don't know if i should freeze the rabbit, if anyone could do any kind of testing on it or what. maybe i'm overreacting, but if you had seen the light i saw and the thing fly over your head, you would wonder too.. anyone have any ideas? ps the rabbit has something coming out of his nose..
content.summary: A green light flew over my head then came back and shined on the side of my garage.. rabbit dead

content.detailedDescription: I zoomed in a bit, so we could see it better.
content.summary: Better photos.

content.detailedDescription: Heading south on bakerview road aprox 5:30 pm saw a flash with a long tail moving across most of sky in 3-4 seconds. very clear evening, not a plane or like any shooting star i have seen, much brighter and lower than a satellite. the duration and speed of movement caught my eye and made me really hold my breath, it was unlike anything ive ever seen and moved east to west as i drove south.
content.summary: Streak accross 2/3 rds of sky very fast, covering a great distance in 3-4 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
Standing outside in the dark facing west we saw a large light in the sky. it was reddish / orangish with a lighter border, roughly diamond shaped. perhaps 2 degrees of arc in width and 50% more in height. centered around 20-30 degrees above the horizon. it last 1 or 2 seconds.

a second, smaller one - maybe 1/2 the size - appeared a second or two after the first in about the same spot. we might not have believed our eyes if weren't for the second coming along.

they opened up then faded quickly. northern lights? probably not, since: they were in the west; they were quite regular in shape; they came and went quickly; there was no other activity of the sort before or after; la area is too far south; and there was no news the next day on the event that would have been expected if the lights appeared over the city that night.

there was no motion. they just came and went.
content.summary: Large red light in the west

content.detailedDescription: In the fall of 1987 we got a call from a realtor to come up and look a house in clay,ny a suburb of syracuse. we left staten island at 6:30pm,we being my wife and 2 very young daughters. we have made the drive many times  so we know the trip is only 3 and a half hrs. that night we had torrential rains.So we proceeded on the nj turnpike north and then to 17 west which will take us to the shawungunk mts.Well before we exited the turnpike i stopped at a rest stop and bought coffee and snacks for the girls.We turned on to 17w, thats when my wife looked up and said "it looks like we were driving of the edge of the earth",when she said that i turned to look at her when then turned to look at the road and it was daylight and we were 33 miles from syracuse.Iwoke up my wife and she yelled nervously "what happened" all i could say is i dont know. and i dont remember the trip here.I cant remember the trip here. i had to physically awaken my two girls.
content.summary: Missing time.

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting friends in san diego this weekend. as i was driving aorund downtown, i took a couple of random pics. later on, i went back to review the pics i had taken and came across this. i did not see any helicopters or planes in the area at the time of my pic, so i though it was just a dot on my lens. but once i zoomed in on it, i relaized it was much more than that! :)

i took the pic from my blackberry curve, it's not the best, but it's a pretty good shot from a camera phone! 

mahalo,

kim lindsey
content.summary: Wtf!?!

content.detailedDescription: I was driving south on i-89 during the evening of september 16 of this year to pick my wife up at dartmouth hitchcock medical center when i noticed a dark object in the sky ahead of my position. it was moving in the same direction as i was traveling. the setting sun was brightly illuminating the sky as i was trying to determine what i was seeing when my eye caught a brillient (can't quite find the right desciptive term) shining sphere to my right moving quickly (not incredibly fast) to my left. it was perfectly smooth on the sunward side , moved absolutely straight and did not change speed or coarse the entire time it was in view , from horizon to horizon. this object was approximatley at the same altitude as the first. about half way between me and the first. but it was moving at a right angle to the first. as i continued down the interstate i caught up to the first object and discovered it was a hot air baloon. whith leaves me with nagging questions. with the baloon in the background it lends scale to the sphere, i estimate it to be 4-6 feet in diamiter. whitch would be a large mylar baloon and if a baloon why was it going noticeably faster than the known hot air baloon and at a 90 degree angle to it.
content.summary: I observed a shiny metalic sphere (it had no detail and was highly reflective) moving quickly across the sky as i drove.

content.detailedDescription: Saw three very bright, still moving lights looking ssw rom 39th street in se portland, as i was driving to see a friends house. at first i thought it was jupiter and venus, which were visible low on the horizon, but then saw these three lights in the sky at the same time. they were very bright and motionless, at first i thought they were airplanes but two of them remained motionless and did not increase in size as a moving airplane would. they caught my eye because of the intensity of the lights and their still positions. same time saw a slow moving airplane very quietly moving around in the same area. i called my girlfriend to witness my account, she told me to take a pic but my camera doesn't do well with pinpoint lights at night. i was going to let it slide, but then saw a similar report and decided to collaborate. i was very excited and felt i had witnessed something unusual. as i was driving trees and small hills obscured my view and i had to pull off and park to get a good view of it.
content.summary: Three bright hovering lights seen from portland, oregon

content.detailedDescription: The time was approximately 18:15 to 18:30 with a clear sky and no moon yet, sometime during january of 2008. i was leaving home and happened to look up to see if any jets were flying overhead (i feel i need to explain this habit. i love to fly in small aircraft, and came close to getting my license before a medical condition made it virtually impossible to do so. so most anything about flying even down to watching planes fly over has become a hobby) and noticed a jet flying overhead to the southwest. what caught my attention was the sound of the engines, louder than usual and leading me to think it might be a large passenger/cargo jet or maybe a military jet of some type. these planes just have a different sound to them than the smaller passenger jets that use the evansville airport, but its hard to explain. i got sight of the jet, and noticed a smaller orange ball of light in front of the jet, and it appeared the jet was following this orange light. i watched for maybe a couple of minutes, looked away for a second, and looked back. the orange light was gone, and the jet was making a turn to the right as if it were breaking off pursuit. the really odd things were i only heard noise from the jet, and when the jet made its turn, it made about a 270 degree turn and left the area in a southeasterly direction as if it was searching for something. recall that i said it initially was heading southwesterly. now why couldnt that pilot have just made a 90 degree turn and gone directly to the southeast instead of making almost a full circle before going the desired direction. this jet was low, enough for the engines to sound louder than normal, and i could tell it was low by the look of the strobe and clearance lights on the plane. i noticed that there were no strobe or clearance lights flashing on the orange ball. while watching this event i had no thoughts at all about what i might be seeing, but shortly after this incident i realized i had probably just seen my first ufo. i am thinking that the jet was probably some sort of military craft because passenger/cargo jets flying over the city are usually quite a bit higher and also they are keeping to a straight line course and not making a turn like i described. its hard to explain, but i just had that feeling about the jet. the reason i looked away for a second is that my neighbor had opened his door and walked out on his porch and i looked to see if he was looking my way, but he wasnt. the jet and orange ball were both going at a speed that when i turned back to look at them again, they both should have still been in sight, but the orange ball was gone and the jet was making its circular turn.
content.summary: Orange light followed by large jet at night.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi, i am wondering if there have been any recent reports of old satellites re-entering the atmosphere. i believe it was friday afternoon 10-10-08 somewhere between maybe 14:45 and 16:45. i was on my front porch and observing the high flying jets that cross overhead daily here in evansville. i noticed a very bright whitish light moving slowly from an easterly direction to a southwesterly direction, apparently at very high altitude.  what was odd about this is that while i was watching this object, i also noticed jets flying in the same close area of the sky. while i could see the wings on the jets, i could see no wings on the bright object. i also noticed that the speed of the object relative to the jets was very slow. i am guessing it took maybe 4 minutes for this object to travel approximately a 60 degree field of view. neither the jets or the object were leaving any visible contrail.
 i have observed the shuttle/iss traveling overhead two different times, and it seems that this object was moving slower across the sky, but it was just as bright. one other thing, as this object moved towards the sun, it remained at the same brightness.
i went inside my house to get a pair of small binoculars and was unable to find them so i went back out on my porch to try and locate this object again, but by that time it had passed from my view.
 i am wondering if this might have been space junk re-entering the atmosphere, the shuttle/iss going overhead (the two times i saw this the shuttle/iss was going in an easterly/southerly direction) or maybe the much blamed weather balloon. or could it have been something else? i am kind of ruling out a meteor as this object was going way too slow and not leaving any kind of trail.
content.summary: Unknown light crossing sky during early afternoon.

content.detailedDescription: I live in a below-ground apt. in the rear of the building, which faces the parking lot and a small wooded area...On sunday, nov. 23, at 6:30 am, i was just sitting down to turn my tv on,  when out of the corner of my eye i saw a very large, bright light go from the right of my living room window to the left - it moved in a steady motion, from right to left, then was gone..I could see the light thru my draperies and it was very bright...I knew it could not be a car as cars have to park facing the opposite direction, & no car would have lights that big or bright..I went to the window to see what was happening, and there was nothing in sight....There was no sound of any kind.....In the past, we've had helicopters fly over the area, which of course make noise; however, their searchlights are smaller, as they are above the treeline....This object appeared as though it was going right by the building - it was not in the sky.....It was a rather large light; if i had to give a size estimate, i'd say it had to have been about six feet in diameter...Again, i got the impression that it was a circular object, as seen thru my (very light weight!) drapes.......I was more amazed than anything, especially when i could not see anything in sight, even at a distance, (such as something flying away).
content.summary: Very bright light seen thru drapes; appeared to be round.

content.detailedDescription:
North bound i35 in a 60 mile an hr. big truck north of the cassino at thackerville oklahoma. that's just over the texas boarder. i came upon some flashing lights on the side of the hiway. very strange,they didn't fit in with the surrounding's. as i got closer i could see they were airborn hoverying over the tree's just east of the roadway,my right side.Maybe 30 yards off road and 100 ft. up in the air kinda nestled in the tree line but in plain site.It just hung there like it was watching traffic go by.It had three large dull white lights with two small white lights on either side of the big light.It appeared trianle shaped in the soft glow of the flashing [one second interval] light's.The light's were positioned under the point's of the triangle not on the sides,also they were angled downward about 30 degree's.The overall size of the objet was maybe 100 feet from end to end,not much longer than my big truck with 53 ft. trailer as far as i can guess.These big light's by the way,were as big as one of those large round bail's of hay you see in the pastures out there. at least that big.
the structure of the craft was of a black metalic nature and not smooth in all places.It had a lot of hardware looking texture to it so to speak.
hard to describe.It didn't have piont's at the triangle tip's either.The piont's were not point's at all but instead recessed like some kind of vent system or exhaust maybe.Very menacing and strange to see.
i never saw it move and i was like a deer in the headlight's,had too make myself pull over but had already past it so i looked back and it was still there. i was at a loss,i couldn't go backward.
someone else had to see this thing,there was light to medium traffic in both direction's. i travel that way alot and had never seen anything like this in the area before. i wish i had stopped right there and could have gotten a picture but no camera in my possesion and i really could't believe i was actually seeing what i was seeing.
a once in a lifetime event and i drove rite by !
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.summary: Small hovering  craft with large, dull white flashing lights angled 30 degrees downward located under tri points.

content.detailedDescription:
Date:  22 november 2008	
time: 2015 hours
place:  rosenkopf, germany,  (state of rheinland pfalz)
weather at time:  crystal clear, very cold, temperatures in high 20s.  no moon visible, stars out in full.

our house sits near the top of a rise in our town. the front of the house faces south toward the towns of zweibruecken (10 km or 6 miles away) and pirmasens (approximately 30km away). our living room has four large picture windows that look out over our balcony and the roofs of other houses and barns in town.  you can also see the outlying countryside and valleys.

at 2015 hours while watching a movie with my wife and children in our living room, my wife sees through the windows a large red light rising above the roof of a barn across the street.  she says ���look at the airplane there! that is a weird place for a plane���. i looked immediately and saw the object. the red light was not blinking and appeared as a steady glow. there were no other lights that i could discern. the red light appeared round and was rising at about a 15 degree angle to the roof of the barn. then it suddenly started ascending at a 70-90 degree angle of climb at a high rate of speed.  i immediately ran to get shoes while my daughter grabbed my coat.  my daughter and i then went onto the front balcony and watched as the red object continued to rise from about 1000 feet to an estimated 10,000 feet, where it then stopped motionless in mid-air for about one minute. there was absolutely no noise during its climb. when it stopped at its apex, it looked like a large red dot star sitting in the clear night sky filled with stars.  

as we are watching this now motionless red light levitated in the sky, to our amazement, a second red lighted object appears over the roof of the barn. it was travelling south to east at a slightly climbing altitude of about 500 feet for approximately 5 seconds. i estimate that it was about one to two kilometers away (6/10th mile to 1.2 miles) from our house (and the barn roof)and looked as if it had risen from the valley near the town of wiesbach.  the second red light object was following the same path as the first object when it too suddenly shot up at a 70-90 degree angle at an exceptionally high rate of climb. i estimate the size of second object to be about the size of a single engine airplane. the lighted object was round (spherical) in appearance and glowing deep red.  note: my wife was watching the second red object from the living room.)

my daughter and i watched in amazement as the first red light just disappeared in a blink at very high altitude. meanwhile we are watching the second object follow the same course as the first object, except it climbed at a faster rate of speed than the first, as if it were trying to catch the first object.  again, absolutely no noise at all from this object.  the second red glowing object rose to what i would estimate was the exact same position and altitude as the first object. it did that in approximately 10-15 seconds.  it then stop in mid-air and seemed to take up the same position as the first object.  it remained absolutely motionless in the night sky for about 20-25 seconds.  just like the first object, it disappeared in a blink of an eye.  

these were definitely not fireworks, aircraft flares, rocket motors, parachute flares, slap flares or any military ordnance. there was absolutely no noise, no smoke or flame.  they followed truly unusual flight patterns and trajectories. these lights gained altitude at very high speeds and appeared as if they were not influenced by gravity or wind. the red glow appeared as an intense illumination, no sparks, no smoke trail, just a bath of red light shaped like a sphere.  the second lit object was large, as stated above, at least the size of a single engine aircraft or larger and was in clear view.  

my entire family witnessed the lights. everyone thought it was a very strange event.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red illuminated objects-spheres?

content.detailedDescription: this took place in turner, me. around jan. 10,1977. night was crystal clear, temp approx. 10 degrees f. at about 9 or 9;15 p.M., as three friends were leaving, my wife & i stepped out to enjoy the night and say goodby. one of the others said to look at a sattelite going over. i knew it was too late to see any, thought it might be plane.Light was brighter than sirius,(i always look at orion in winter) going almost due north. the object suddenly stopped, made an almost 90 degree turn, then stopped again. it continued to move at odd angles & at varying speeds. this went on for several minutes 5-10. object then diminished extremely rapidly, as if receding or shrinking. during the entire time there was no sound. we all were exited, talked about it for several days & have told this many times over the years. in 2005, after not hearing from one of these freinds in more than 20 years, the first thing he said was "hey, remember that u.F.O.?" it left a lasting impression on all of us! as the object was silent against a starry background we couldn't guess at size or distance.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star-like object moving erratically,no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting in a garage with the garage door open with 3 other people, when one person shouted ���what���s that���, someone else said ufo, we looked at the glowing fire orange object for a second and i and another person scrambled for our cameras? it was flying rather low, it was going in one direction, in a single line, just like a plane would fly in one direction, but this definitely was not a plane, or anything that i could identify.  the 3 other people i was with had never seen anything like that before either, it flew almost over us, just to the side at little.  it flew in a straight line, it was glowing orange, almost like it was on fire, the object was only visible to us for 2 to 3 minutes, before it disappeared out of site, so it was moving a pretty steady speed.  the object did not make any kind of sudden movements or go up or down in any way, it just stayed on a steady & straight path.  this happened nov.23, 2008 @ around 9:15pm in valrico florida near the intersection of lumsden ave and mulrenna ave., in a neighborhood very close to that intersection, and it was traveling toward the direction of riverview when it disappeared or faded away from our vision, also, the object made no noise that we could hear.  i would say that it looked like a glowing orange fireball meteorite, that was being controlled to move in a straight & steady path, and it did not operate like a regular meteorite at all, this object operated like it was being driven or controlled by something.  i will included the pictures i took, but they do not show what i saw with the naked eye, the only camera i had was my cellphone camera, so my pictures did not turn out good, i will try to get copies of the other photos taken by the other person.  also, when we saw this object, there was no planes or helicopters anywhere near sight and then about 1 minute later after the sighting, there was a jet flying overhead way up high, heading to where the object had just been, so maybe this jet was dispatched to locate this object if calls were coming in before that (perhaps, or maybe it was just a regular pre-planned flight?(who knows), but the jet probably did not see the object because it was flying to where the ufo was, not where it went.  all 4 of us were pretty stunned, and using words to describe it like strange, crazy, weird, unbelievable. 
also, another strange thing about me, other than seeing a ufo is i have a raw piece of moldavite that has a lot of images in it, both with the naked eye and also in photos.  one photo i must included in this ufo report is my photo of a typical looking grey alien in the moldavite, if anyone wants to see the rest of the moldavite pictures, let me know at email:  leonardos-kryptonite@live.Com and i will email them to you, i have a total of 18 photos of this piece of moldavite that shows images like, angels, fairies, demons, nostradamus, a viking, 3 aliens, a wizard, barrack obama, plus more.  and, i happened to have the crystal with me during this ufo sighting because i was going to show my friend the piece of moldavite and some photos i had printed out later on.  for those who are not familiar with moldavite, it is a green glass thought to be formed after a meteorite hit the earth and splashed stuff up in the atmosphere and then the green glass rained back to earth in the czech republic (or something like that).  also, it is the stone of the holy grail and also the crystal of ���extraterrestrial connection���.  google moldavite for more info about this crystal if you want.
so later after the ufo was long gone, my friend looked at the moldavite and moldavite photo of the alien and we joked about maybe it was the piece of moldavite that attracted them.  i hardly ever take the moldavite out of my house, in fact, this was only the second time it has been out of my house since i've had it about 3 years now.  i decided that if they come back and want the piece of moldavite from me, i will give it too them, no questions asked (or maybe swap it for a vacation to their planet if their friendly enough).  it might just be "their" holy grail. (who knows)?
well, in summary, i feel very privileged to have finally seen my first ufo, i love watching pretty much all the paranormal programs on tv.  can't wait to see my first ghost now!
content.summary: Orange glowing circle on top fire glowing on bottom

content.detailedDescription:
At first sight 3 bright white lights were vey low and in a triangular shape from point to point. keeping their exact position (in relation to distance apart from the other) two lights moved south. the third moved north but we were on the freeway southbound so couldn't see where it went. i noticed them because it worried me that planes were that low were flying that close to each other. 
we soon realized they were unlike any planes we have ever seen before because they could stay still. we wondered if they could be blimps. oddly, we did see an airplane and a chopper flying at what seemd to be a fairly close distance, close enough they would have to had seen them. the question remains, what were these unbelievably bright lights hanging motionless in the sky and why aren't we hearing anything on the news?? surely many others saw this as we were not alone on the freeway. going out periodically to check, it seemed from my new vantage point (my mom and dad's place) that they were almost directly above the willamette river in canby or perhaps a little further sw. whatever it was it was nothing we have seen before. we would like to note we aren't claiming we saw aliens. we are saying we saw something in the night sky that was very unusual to us
content.summary: On i 205 s. three very bright lights  were fixed in sky at very low altitude. too dark to see more than the bright white light.

content.detailedDescription: I just got home and let the dog into the backyard which faces west. it was clear out. i love looking at the stars and looked up about 45 degrees due west. all of a sudden i thought i was watching a meteor. which is cool. it was heading north. it was near the normal jet traffic height and direction here on the coast. it was too fast for a jet. i noticed shortly after first noticing it that it had 5 white lights underneath it in a v or boomerang configuration. the lights were constant and not blinking. when it reached a northwestern position, it veared left or west in a gradual curve the vanished. this all happened in about a 30 second time span or less. it was perfectly quiet. i went in and told the wife about what i saw and thought i was nuts. i know what i saw. it was not a typical jet. it was not a meteor. it was not a satellite either. i've seen lots of all these things. i felt elated enough to write you guys. which i have never done. there was no time for a camera. it was just good timing and luck, i think. i'm 44 years old. married, quite sane and have lived here most of my life. i have a great eye for detail also. thank you for your time. hope this is of use.
content.summary: Fast as a meteor.

content.detailedDescription: Went outside to have a cigarette with my husband and spotted a bright sphere about 75 degrees up in the sky just to the south of us. it first appeared to be moving to the north west then later started moving to the south. i went inside to grab my video camera and call the kids out to see it also, it took a few minutes to get it in sight on the video camera. we had the telescope out and my son got it sighted in and it had the same smaller sphere circling it like the last one we saw. i could not see it in the video camera and never got a chance to see it in the telescope this time. i had my oldest daughter take photos, my youngest got mad that she could not locate the binoculars, said she was bored and went back inside. about 25-30 minutes into the sighting it got bright and in the camera you could see debris coming out the back of it and more sphere like objects appeared to come out of it. we could not see it any longer with our eyes though we still could see it on the video camera. my son lost sight of the object and couldn't find it again after it "exploded". he was also taking pictures with my oldest daughter's camera. i imported part of the video to my computer and it is 517mb and it did not want to go through the first time that i attached it. so i reduced the size in movie maker to 10mb, but i will get the full video on a dvd disc and mail it tomorrow.
content.summary: Bright sphere object that exploded and drops more spheres.

content.detailedDescription: My uncle and i are at the gorge dam powerhouse.  he is just inside talking to the electrical engineer creating power for the grid at a panel next to the turbines.  the huge disc on edge comes down and around in front of the powerhouse and lays down flat hovering above the water in front of the powerhouse and begins taking energy from the grid causing the alarms to start making the engineer immediately make more power.  i am at the exterior door in front of the powerhouse on a landing above stairs watching the disc from thirty feet away.  right away a row  of windows appear to open all the way around the lower portion of the disc which is about 100 feet in diameter and thirty feet thick.  i see many dark colored small human looking occupants looking at me and moving aside so that others take turns looking at me.  they seem to smile at me and i feel they like me.  i am trying to get my uncle to come to where i am and look but he is talking to the engineer whom is anxiously working. i see a whirling motion in the water below the disc and it is humming lightly and then the outside edge in two places like rings begin to counter rotate increasing in speed and the windows close.  i yell at my uncle that he is going to miss it if he doesn't come.  just as he comes to my side the disc moves away and up to just above tree level of the nearby forest covering the residences of newhalem and i see a clear dome on the top of the disc with two brightly dressed occupants shaped like humans but they are not inside the dome i believe are piloting it slowly away from us.  it flys directly over my uncles house in newhalem and i tell him it is a ufo.  he is a christian and tells me it is made by the russians and threatening the dam.  as we are watching the disc an air force rf-101 jet flys around in front of the powerhouse and lights its afterburners knocking out some of the powerhouse windows.  my uncle thinks it is a naavy jet from oak harbor.  i tell him no, i have bubblegum cards with the rf-101 on it.  the jet tries to get close to the disc.  the disc moves about five miles in two seconds and easily gets away.The fbi is called after we find my aunt and others whom it flew over crying. end.
content.summary: Large occupied disc taking energy from gorge dam powerhouse near me.

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving up a hill in natick i looked into boston and saw what looked like two bright lights that were flying over boston. i could not tell the distance away from the car but it was at least 50 miles and was very high in the air. one of the lights was dimmer than the other. the lights were stationary and very noticable. i pointed the lights out to my family in the car with me and they couldn't tell what they were. i asked my mom if i could grab her cellphone to take a picture but as we rounded the corner the lights dissapeared. as we took the corner i could have sworn that they begain to move. since i live near boston i can tell what airplanes look like because the airspace is filled with them. this ufo was way too bright to be an airplane. anyone eles with any information send an e-mail to me at brightlightsoverboston@gmail.Com with no caps. thanks for reading this...
content.summary: Two bright lights looking as if they were flying over boston then dissapeared, too bright to be an airplane.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside my front door to smoke a ciggerette and noticed a strange light between what i belived to be the planets mars and possibly venus. i had my uncle come outside and witness this object (both my uncle and myself are former military members). we both watched the object move slowly to our relative right then it then moved to the the left we noticed three to four afterburner like lights from this object and the alignment was strait so i can only say that the object was rectangular from the aft porttion. i had my wife come out and she also seen the object and about the same time the local police crusier was coming down the street and i stopped him and asked him if there had been any strange reports and he said that there were none; i then told him why i had stopped him and he then got out of the vehicle. at this time all four of us seen the object turn up and then climb towards the atmosphere and within a few short seconds the object was no longer visable.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Slow moving & erratic behavior

content.detailedDescription:
I was looking at the night sky at my cabin near brookville, pa.  from the east, i noticed three star like objects flying in formation very slow (about 25 degrees apart [the width of my hand]).  i thought that they were three military aricraft flying in formation at a very high altitude because i heard no noise.  i often see passenger aircraft overhead and i have to wait a few seconds to hear it as it flys by.   however, this object made no noise at all and i thought it must be fery high as it also moved so slow.  however, what i did notice was that the background stars between the lights were not present.  that should only mean that the objects (the three points of light) must be one object.  it made no noise at all and flew very slow.  if it was in fact very high then the object must be extremely large in size!  or, it was not very big but flying silent at a very low altitude.
  i had my daughter come out and look but i don't think she saw anything and she doesn't remember...She was seven at the time.  so i don't know what it was.
content.summary: Dark, triangle shaped object with three white lights on each corner

content.detailedDescription: Circulaba de sur a norte de maneadero a ensenada ,cuando veo caer una bola de fuego a lo lejos dejando una estela de humo negro el cielo estaba claro. he buscado informacion de lo que pudo ser sin lograrlo.Gracias
content.summary: Bola de fuego.

content.detailedDescription: My fianc���e and i(i had just proposed, haha) were leaving indianapolis and on our way back to bloomington where she resides. we took bluff road out of indianapolis to state road 37. driving down south, past the greenwood region, but way before ever reaching martinsville, i see an aircraft in the distance, with a solitary flashing light, which flashes once every second or two, moving slowly from south towards the north, rearing up to pass me overhead. i'm not paying too much attention to it, i was too focused on driving, but my lady told me, "check out that plane." at which point, i look up through my windshield, as it's about ten seconds before it could pass overhead of my car. i realize how low it is, it's only 50-100 feet(i'm terrible at estimating lengths) above us, this scares me, as i believe it's a dangerously low flying plane. when i look up however, and when the light flashed, i caught my first glimpse of the object. i said out loud, "that's not an airplane." second flash of light, i can distinctly make out the shape, that of which i have never seen in my life, and i come from a family with a history in aviation. it was like a skeleton, just composed of bars/supports, possibly metallic, and it was two times, possibly three times, larger than my car. the light flashed from the center of the object, and i could not see anything except for the supports/bars that composed the structure, no i'm not sure where anyone could possibly pilot the object from. it was silent, it didn't interrupt my radio signal, it flew right overhead, and there were many people on the state road who could of, but probably did not take any notice of the object at all. i kept driving, because there was nothing i could have been able to do, i had left my camera in bloomington. (oh was i furious. haha.) my lady and i just kept talking about how strange the aircraft was, and she kept watching it as i kept driving, she said it eventually stopped moving north, and started moving straight up into the night sky. she lost sight of the beast as the drive continued. she was convinced it was some kind of ultralight aircraft, but it was so much larger, and there was nothing attached to the structure, like a glider or anything. originally i thought the object was triangular or pyramidal shaped, but it was so large and i only got to see the front half of it, so there could be much more to the back end than i realized. when i came home, i told my father all about this aircraft, and he could not think of a similar object he's ever seen in the air. so i did some research of my own, and the only thing i can come up with that is similar looking, strikingly similar, but i believe a bit larger, is the lunar landing research vehicle. i believe that's what it's called, but for your sake i will attach a picture to this report, so nobody has to go out google searching.
content.summary: Close contact with low flying ufo.

content.detailedDescription: Viajaba de sur a norte a ensenada mexico y vi una bola de fuego caer en line recta dejando una estela de humo negro. he vuscado informacion en todas partes y no encuetro nada. pudieran informarme que clase de evento fue.Gracias pd esto fue en ensenada baja mexico
content.summary: Bola de fuego.

content.detailedDescription:
We live close to the lake. i was sitting on my sofa and noticed out my front window a hovering object that continued to flash green and red lights. there were no planes out that i know that can sit idle for 10 minutes or longer and continue to stand still. the object was just above the tree tops over the lake. it was dark out, pitch black, all i could see were the lights.
    i opened my door to listen for the sound of a plane or helicopoter, nothing. no sounds whatsoever. i watched for several minutes and the lights continued to pulsate with different patterns, one time it would flash green for several seconds then red, then the red would flash for 5 or 6 times and this went on for some time. i was going to call my son at college but i wasn't sure if he'd be awake and at the time, i just assumed it was a plane. 
a month or so later, i saw an article in the plain dealer and a man by the name of nick hill also saw the same thing and he videotaped it on the east side of cleveland. 
l
content.summary: Green and red flashing, pulsating lights over the lake.

content.detailedDescription: On  a  normal  route  with  post-office  mail, ie  from  peterborough  to  kings  lynn  norfolk, noticed  brilliant  illumination  of  coloured  lights  less  than  quarter  a  mile  away. the  road  i  was  travelling  on  (the  a47) was  unaturally  lacking  traffic, the  time  was  approaching  2045, the  normal  time  i  usually  reached  this  part  of  the  road  system. i  first  observed  on  closer  inspection, now  only  yards  away.  a  object  quite  static  and  settled  upon  the  field  to  my  right. i  instictively  slowed  the  post-office  vehicle  down  to  a  stop  and  looking  through  the  drivers  side-window  saw  the  following,, { now  some  25ft  away)  a  cage  shaped  multi-coloured  highly  luminous  object. about  8ftsquare. there  was  a very  noticeable  sequence  of  lights  rotating  around  its  bars..And  they  pulsated  in  green\blue\red  fashion, that  is  to  say  each  independent  bar  on  this  cage-formation  turned  on  and  off  at  great  speed. at  this  point  i  decided  to  take  a  closer  look. after  releasing  the  foot-security door-lever  i  pulled  the  door  open  and  stepped  out. again  :supisiously: there  was  no  car  movement  moving  up  or  down  this  a47  road, there  was  no  audible  sound  whatsoever. i  proceeded  across  towards  the  fields  fence  so  was  then  approx  18 or  twenty  feet  from  this  :object?: my  right  eye  was  smarting  terribly  and  i  needed  to  rub  it  to  move  the  blur  from  my  sight. i  stopped  unafraid  and  observed. there  was  no  top  or  bottom  to  this  object  just  the  rotating  bars  around  its  cubed  form. it  was  roughly  8ftsquare. the  lights  had  dimmed  or  i  imagined  they  had, again  no  sound  just  colour. after  perhaps  two-mins  the  craft? rose  upward,  again  without  sound. it  ascended  to  forty  feet  and  then  dissapeared, as  though  into  a  time-corridoor. the  weather  conditions  were  perfect. no  clouds  clear  wonderful  night  sky. the  craft\object  did  not  ascend  up  into  the  heavens, i  watched  it  de-materialise. for  a  moment  i  collected  my  thoughts  then  returned  back  to  my  van.Still  there  was  no  traffic. i  resumed  a  steady  drive  to  kings  lynn  sorting  office  and  said  nothing  to  no  one  about  the  experience.
content.summary: Whilst  driving  post  security  van  noticed  very  illuminated  object   to  my  right   landed  as  it  were  to  the  edge  of  a  field,  slowed  down  van  to  investigate.

content.detailedDescription:
Was standing near the beach in neptune beach, fl.
i was star gazing when i noticed a light that would resemble any other
satellite movement. it appeared bluish-white, tiny star like sized, moving at a slow rate. it was definitely well up in the atmosphere, or perhaps stratosphere.

i watched the light move in a north-easterly direction, then about 20 seconds of watching this light, it started turning orange-white...
it then flared for about 2 seconds before it vanished.

there were no clouds, and the moon was not present.
very clear view. there were other very obvious airplanes in their normal traffic patterns.
content.summary: Bluish white satellite morphs into bigger orange light...

content.detailedDescription:
This report was telephoned into mufon and left on an answering machine.

the witness is a retired police detective.  he was taking his dog out at 9:00 p.M. cdt on monday, november 17, 2008 when he noticed 4 or 5 bright yellow-orange lights in the sky arranged in a straight row.  he estimates the altitude at 5,000 feet and the lights were silent.  he also observed a number of military jets also flying in the area (making lots of noise) but at higher altitude (15 - 20,000 feet).  on tuesday, november 18, 2008 (also at 9:00 p.M. cdt), he observed 3 to 4 more orange lights in the sky for a few seconds before they disappeared.  there were military jets in the air on the second night as well.  the witness does not have a home computer and does not have an email address.
content.summary: 4 - 5 orange lights w/air force jets near.

content.detailedDescription:
While observing after dark in the western sky both jupiter & venus i noticed what appeared to be an aircraft with it's landing lights on. as it approached my position it remained steady without diminishing in brightness nor did i observe aircraft running lights. i then thought it may have been two military aircraft, (hanscom a.B. is only a few miles west from the position i was observing this event) in formation, because, in hot pursuit was an aircraft with it's running lights on, (red and green on wings, strobe). the steady bright light seemed to be moving at a much greater speed than the pursuing aircraft. as the bright light came directly above me at zenith it could be mistaken as a satellite but it's brightness was about twice as bright as venus at this time of night and twice the size. as the object past my zenith and heading east it slowly started to turn a beep ruby red. a red i've never seen from an aircraft, then disappear, vanish. the pursuing aircraft could not catch up with this object and broke off the pursuit after this object turned red and disappeared. the pursuing aircraft then bank left and turn around and headed back west. i could not see the profile of the pursuing aircraft, but the engine sound was distinctly military.
approx. 6pm, sat. 11/22/2008, weather was clear, cloudless, cold. unobscured view of the sky. place: north reading, ma, off chestnut street, across from harmony vale cemetery, property is raised higher off the street level and about 200 feet back from the road. few lights with little light pollution.
content.summary: Bright white steady light from western horizon to zenith, from zenith to eastern horizon turn deep ruby red.
